title: Self-Regulated Learning Pattern Analysis and Strategy Development in Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course Strengthening Online Collaboration and Self-Regulation Skills During Mathematical Problem-Solving for Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply self-regulation strategies (content monitoring, evaluation, socio-emotional regulation) in online collaborative environments
Learners can visualize and analyze their self-regulation patterns using Epistemic Network Analysis (ENA)
Learners can develop personalized collaboration strategies by referencing high-performing groups' self-regulation patterns
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
